Wellington player wins $7 million in first Lotto Powerball victory of 2025 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-player-wins-7-million-in-first-lotto-powerball-victory-of-2025/YMMW7DSA7RFGNCF2SFHQQV53YI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-player-wins-7-million-in-first-lotto-powerball-victory-of-2025/YMMW7DSA7RFGNCF2SFHQQV53YI/ The win was made up of $6 million from Powerball and $1 million from Lotto First Division. Wed, 08 Jan 2025 08:32:58 +0000 A Wellington punter has become New Zealand’s first Powerball multi-millionaire of 2025 after winning $7 million in Wednesday night's draw.
Department of Conservation investigating after whale dies in Kaikōura area and another is injured https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/department-of-conservation-investigating-after-whale-dies-in-kaikoura-area-and-another-is-injured/SAOC4SZE35AUXMAT3VVSBXCAVM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/department-of-conservation-investigating-after-whale-dies-in-kaikoura-area-and-another-is-injured/SAOC4SZE35AUXMAT3VVSBXCAVM/ A tour operator spotted an injured sperm whale in Kaikōura on December 29. Wed, 08 Jan 2025 07:17:58 +0000 The Department of Conservation is investigating after one whale was injured and another died at the top of the South Island during the new year period. Photo / Whale Watch Kaikoura

Offender owns up, gardeners visiting Northland ‘overwhelmed’ by crowdfunding and support https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/offender-owns-up-gardeners-visiting-northland-overwhelmed-by-crowdfunding-and-support/TLHS4HUG7ZGHHLOZ6YC3NOFNL4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/offender-owns-up-gardeners-visiting-northland-overwhelmed-by-crowdfunding-and-support/TLHS4HUG7ZGHHLOZ6YC3NOFNL4/ Sarah CurtisA Northland thief has owned up to stealing all a visiting gardening group's tools Wed, 08 Jan 2025 03:00:00 +0000 Whenua Warrior charitable trust founder Kelly Francis is happy helping communities grow their own food. However, she's "devastated" that one of those communities in Northland recently stole all the trust's tools and vandalised two of its vehicles.
